document.full_text: texas's rise in clout is thanks largely to the size of its republican delegation and committee positions, but it also had influence under the democrats because of the seniority of several members.
document.title: the texas tribune: texas' clout in congress rises along with g.o.p.
lines_and_colors: texas's rise in clout is thanks largely to the size of its republican delegation and committee positions, but it also had influence under the democrats because of the seniority of several members.
